alert.note: Alert for Braxton; Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Jackson; Lewis; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 20 at 2:05AM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Calhoun, southeastern Ritchie, southwestern Doddridge, Gilmer, west central Lewis, north central Braxton, southern Wirt, northern Roane and east central Jackson Counties through 300 AM EDT... At 205 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Spencer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Glenville, Grantsville, Arnoldsburg, Cedar Creek State Park, Burnsville, Reedy, Sand Fork, Auburn, Shock, Millstone, Cherry, Smithville, Mount Zion, Newberne, Lucille, Alum Bridge, Big Springs, Berea, Brohard and Stumptown. This includes Interstate 79 between mile markers 78 and 85, and mile marker 90 and near mile marker 92. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Braxton; Calhoun; Doddridge; Gilmer; Jackson; Lewis; Ritchie; Roane; Wirt
